content:
Hi!
I am a PhD student working in algebraic combinatorics but I started playing through the numbers game and am interested in getting more involved with lean. Nice to find you all here!
Aram
Welcome Aram! Did you see this thread? Having feedback would be very useful to the community.

@Aram Bingham We're slowly trying to get some combinatorics and graph theory into mathlib. For combinatorics, @Bhavik Mehta would be a good person to speak to. Graph theory was happening on the hedentiemi branch of mathlib, but has been dormant for a couple of weeks.
Hi Patrick! Thanks for sharing I will have a look soon.
Thanks for the pointers Johan, that's exciting to hear. I will get in touch when I get up to speed,
